channel.title: Which game have you played the most hours on?
channel.description:
Post which game on steam you've played the most hours on and how many hours.
Mine is MW2: 756 hours.
:fffuuu:

item.title: Which game have you played the most hours on?
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
#1 – rFactor[PC]
#2 – TF2[PC]
#3 – MSR (metropolis street racer)[DC]

This is afaik, of course, 2 of these I don’t have exact figures for.

item.title: Which game have you played the most hours on?
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Together with mods and the over 9000 runthroughs I’ve done, it must be Half-Life 1. I don’t have a nice round hour figure though. My TF2 says 185 hours; that’s the highest one in my Steam account atm.

item.description:
Gmod Tops it, then TF2 is a close second, next is a tie between The Elder Scrolls 3 and 4 lastly the l4d2.

https://steamcommunity.com/id/surplusninja/games?tab=all

(note all my play time is not recorded in this I am not always on xfire)

item.title: Which game have you played the most hours on?
item.dc:creator: Suggestive
item.description:
On Steam:
TF2: 419.1 hrs
Left 4 Dead 2: 43.8 hrs

But then I’m looking through my save files on the bawks and I swear I must have 120 hours on FFXIII and even more on Dragon Age Origins and Mass Effect 2.

Feels bad. Feels really bad.

Read full topic
